abstract: Australia has approved Chinalco’s recent purchase of a minority stake in Anglo-Australian miner Rio Tinto, but warned the Chinese aluminum giant against buying more shares without prior approval.
snippet: Australia has approved Chinalco’s recent purchase of a minority stake in Anglo-Australian miner Rio Tinto, but warned the Chinese aluminum giant against buying more shares without prior approval.
lead_paragraph: Australia has approved Chinalco‘s recent purchase of a minority stake in Anglo-Australian miner Rio Tinto, but warned the Chinese aluminum giant against buying more shares without prior approval.
